work.name: unspun
highlights: Pioneered a novel machine learning system for automated denim pattern generation from 3D body scans, achieving 90% customer fit satisfaction on first try-on and reduced manual intervention by 50%.
Designed an optimization framework for pattern sewability, including seams and angles matching, utilizing custom Python-based geometry kernels and Scipyâ€™s constrained optimization toolbox.

work.name: Tesla
highlights: Independently implemented a novel framework for autopilot AI training data synthesis, processing point clouds, voxels, and video data for neural network training.
Designed a stream-lined architecture data generation pipeline that emphasized intuitive usage and code reusability, adopted as the organizational standard.

work.name: Yannix
highlights: Conceptualized and led research on anamorphic lens aberration simulation, incorporating Monte Carlo method and Seidel aberration theory, leading to new product offers.
Conducted optimization research on match-moving technology utilizing Bayesian and variational statistical methods.
